content:
I cannot have personal preferences or emotions, but i can give you some examples of fast guards who are known for their quickness and agility on the court.

some of the most exciting and entertaining fast guards to watch in the nba include:

1. russell westbrook: westbrook is known for his explosive athleticism and aggressive style of play. he has incredible speed and quickness, which allows him to get to the basket and create scoring opportunities for himself and his teammates.

2. damian lillard: lillard is a skilled ball-handler and a creative scorer, with a quick first step and the ability to change direction on a dime. he has great speed and agility, making him a tough matchup for defenders.

3. kyrie irving: irving is known for his flashy ball-handling skills and his ability to create space and get to the basket. he has excellent speed and quickness, which he uses to get past defenders and create scoring opportunities.

4. john wall: wall is a lightning-fast guard who is known for his speed and athleticism. he is a relentless attacker who is always looking to push the pace of the game and create scoring opportunities for himself and his teammates.

5. de'aaron fox: fox is one of the fastest guards in the league and is known for his quickness and agility. he has great ball-handling skills and is a crafty scorer, with the ability to get to the basket and finish in traffic.

overall, these fast guards are highly-skilled and entertaining players to watch on the basketball court, and they can make a significant impact on the game with their speed and agility.
